Translations.Text: [Wo ci tongyang de enhui he zhishi gei] ai you bu [zhu]. Dangshi, ta [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu:“Wo zaoyu buxingle, ni shi renci zhong zui renci de.”
Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, wei ta jie chu liao buxing, bing ba ta [yi shisan] de jiaren ji tongyang de renshu ci hai ta,[zhe] shi cong wo jiang shi de enhui, shi dui chongbai wo de renmen de gaojie.
[Ni dang ji zhu] yi si ma yi, yi de lisi he zu le ke fu lei, quan shi jianren zhe [zhu].
Wo shi tamen jinru wo de enhui zhong, tamen que shi shanren.

[Wo ceng xianshi yi xiang enhui gei] zuo nu. Dangshi, ta zai fennu zhong chuzou, bing caixiang wo bu hui chengfa ta [jiang zainan gei ta]. Ta zai hei'an zhong [gao sheng] qiqiu wo [shuo]:“Chu ni [an la] wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Zanmei ni chaojue! Wo dique zuo cuole.”
Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, zhengjiu ta tuolile zainan. Wo ruci zhengjiu xinshimen.
[Wo ceng xianshi yi xiang enhui gei] zai ke li ya. Dangshi, ta [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang wo gudu wu si, ni shi zui hao de jicheng zhe.”

Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, wo ci gei ta ye ha ya, bing wei ta zhiyule ta de qizi [de bu yu zheng]. Tamen chang zhengxian xing shan, bing zai xiwang yu weiju zhong qiqiu wo. Tamen dui wo shi qiangong de.

[Wo cengcifu gei] nage baochi zhenjie de nuzi [ma'er ya], wo [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] ba linghun chui ru ta [de xiukou] nei, bing shi ta he ta de erzi [er sa] chengwei zhong shijie de yi zhong jixiang.
Nimen de zhege zongjiao [yisilan jiao], yuan shi yige tongyi de zongjiao, er wo shi nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai wo.
Dan tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng] wei jiaoyi er fenliele ziji de zongjiao [yisilan jiao]. Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.
Shei xingshan qie shi xinshi, shei de shangong jue bu hui bei fouren, wo dique [zai ta de shanxing bu zhong] wei ta jilu.
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi [de renmin], tamen yao chong fan chenshi shi jue bu keneng de,
zhidao ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei shifang, tamen jiang cong gege gaodi cheng qun chong chu.

Zhenshi de nuoyan [fuhuo ri] linjinle.[Renlei cong fenmu zhong bei fuhuo shi, ni jiang kanjian] bu xinyang zhe de yanjing turan yin kongbu er zhi deng.[Tamen jiang shuo]:“Women zhen gaisi! Women dique hu lue liao ci shi. Bu, women shi bu yi zhe.”
Nimen [bu xinyang zhe] he nimen she an la er chongbai de dou shi huo yu de ranliao, nimen dou jiang jinru qizhong [shou huoxing].
Jiaru zhexie [ouxiang] shi zhuzai, tamen jiu bu hui jinru huo yule. Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong [shou huoxing].
Tamen jiang zai huo yu li tanxi houjiao, tamen zai nali jiang yi wu suo wen.
Fan meng wo ci fu zhe, zhexie ren jiang yuanli huo yu.
Tamen jiang ting bu dao [huo yu de] renhe shengyin, tamen jiang yong juyu tamen suo xi'ai de shenghuo zhong.
[Fuhuo ri], zuida de kongbu bu hui shi tamen youchou, tianshimen jianglai huanying tamen:“Zhe jiushi nimen suo bei xunuo de rizi.”
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba tian juan qilai, youru juan qi huajuan yiyang. Wo zuichu shi zenyang chuangzao de, wo jiang shi ta zenyang fuyuan. Zhe shi wo xu xia de nuoyan, wo yiding yao shixian [zhu].
Zai [wo xie ru]“shou baohu de xian pai”[an la nali de jingdian] hou, wo que yi zai “zai bu'er”[suoyou jingdian] zhong xie dao:“Wo shanliang de pu renmen bi jiang jicheng na tudi [leyuan zhi di].”
Dui chongbai an la de minzhong, ci [“gulanjing”] zhong que youyi xiang mingbai de qishi.
Wo paiqian ni [mu sheng], zhi weile ci min zhong shijie.
Ni shuo:“Wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi du yi de zhu [zhu][an la]. Nimen hui guishun an la [chengwei musilin] ma?”

Jiaru tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng] beili [yisilan jiao], name, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo xiang nimen gongkai xuangao, wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao de [fuhuo ri de xingfa] shi linjin de, haishi yaoyuan de?”
[Ni shuo]:“Wulun gao sheng [gongkai] de yanyu, haishi nimen suo yincang de, ta quan zhidao.
Wo bu zhidao, zhe yexu shi dui nimen de yi zhong kaoyan he zhanshi de xiangshou.”
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni binggong panjue. Women de zhu shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], qiu ta yuanzhu [women] zhansheng nimen suo wangyan de [ru an la you ernu deng].”
